Texts.Eng: Failure! You've not yet gathered the required materials.
I can repair the thrusters with the ship's auto repair module but ^green;I'll need ^orange;20 core fragments ^green;from the planet below.

The ship's thrusters have been repaired! Travel within this system is now available. ^green;We need to fix the ship's FTL drive with ^orange; 20 Erchius crystals. ^green;Our scanners have also picked up the presence of a ^orange;strange gate ^green;in this system, we should check that out first!

The ship's thrusters have been repaired! Travel within this system is now available. ^green;We need to stabilize the ship's HRD drive with ^orange; 20 Erchius crystals. ^green;Our scanners have also picked up the presence of a ^orange;strange gate ^green;in this system, we should check that out first!
What?! You've not yet gathered the required materials I need.
